title: Pixilate foundry: redesign and new release
content:
Just finished a redesign of Pixilate, my small foundry with mostly handwritten/handdrawn fonts. It is now mobile and tablet friendly and uses a friendlier system for purchases. I also released [Bellota](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415034643/http:/www.pixilate.com/font/bellota/), an open source (OFL) display sans.

Feedback is welcome on both site & fonts. :)
author: spiral

comments.content:
Um, I kinda forgot the most relevant part:

[Pixilate- handcrafted fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415034643/http:/www.pixilate.com/)

Very cute! Congrats and best of luck.
